department: Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada
description: Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada needs TSPS Staffing consultants services for Human Resources Services stream, under the Task and Solutions Professional Services method of supply.
full_summary:
## Tender Announcement: TSPS Staffing Consultants for IRB

### Reference Information

* Reference Number: cb-9042-76755218
* Amendment Number: 6
* Solicitation Number: 20230816-IRB
* Publication Date: September 14th, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: October 19th, 2023, 14:00:00
* Amendment Date: October 19th, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: November 6th, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: September 30th, 2025

### Tender Information

This tender announcement is for the provision of Staffing Consultants Professional Services for the Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada (IRB). We are seeking a contract with a duration of approximately 2 years, including an option for an additional 18 months.

### Description of Work

The IRB requires a staffing consultant to provide services from the Human Resources Services stream, under the Task and Solutions Professional Services method of supply, using the Task-Based Supply Arrangement. We anticipate the need for 350 days of effort to complete the project. Our objective is to establish a contract with one (1) Supply Arrangement Holder under E60ZT-18TSPS who meets the requirements for this project.

### Security Requirements

* Security Clearing: Minimum Corporate Security Required is Designated Organization Screening (DOS)
* Security Clearance: Minimum Resource Security Required is Reliability

### Trade Agreements

The requirement is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-United States-Mexico Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP).

### Requirements for Bidders

Prospective bidders must be a Supply Arrangement Holder under E60ZT-18TSPS and meet the requirements for the Human Resources Services stream. Detailed information about the requirements and the bidding process can be found in the "Supplier Instructions" section of the tender files.

### Contact Information

* Steve Dessureault, Contract Manager
* Phone: (514) 249-2780
* Email: [steve.dessure
